monitor-jmx.name: VM/Memory/Used
monitor-jmx.description: Represents the amount of memory currently used (in bytes)

monitor-virtual.name: VM/Memory/% Used
monitor-virtual.description: Represents the percentage amount of memory currently used

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Memory/Used
monitor-jmx.description: Used

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Memory/Max
monitor-jmx.description: Max

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Memory/Commited
monitor-jmx.description: Represents the amount of memory (in bytes) that is guaranteed to be available for use by the Java virtual machine. Amount of committed memory may change over time (increase or decrease). The Java virtual machine may release memory to the system and committed could be less than init. committed will always be greater than or equal to used.

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Memory/Max
monitor-jmx.description: Represents the maximum amount of memory (in bytes) that can be used for memory management. Its value may be undefined. Maximum amount of memory may change over time if defined. Amount of used and committed memory will always be less than or equal to max if max is defined. A memory allocation may fail if it attempts to increase the used memory such that used > committed even if used <= max would still be true (for example, when the system is low on virtual memory).

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Garbage Collector/PS MarkSweep/CollectionCount
monitor-jmx.description: Returns the number of collections that have occurred since last call

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Garbage Collector/PS MarkSweep/CollectionTime
monitor-jmx.description: Returns the approximate accumulated collection elapsed time in milliseconds since last call

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Garbage Collector/PS Scavenge/CollectionCount
monitor-jmx.description: Returns the number of collections that have occurred since last call

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Garbage Collector/PS Scavenge/CollectionTime
monitor-jmx.description: Returns the approximate accumulated collection elapsed time in milliseconds since last call

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Threads/ThreadCount
monitor-jmx.description: Returns the current number of live threads including both daemon and non-daemon threads

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Threads/DaemonThreadCount
monitor-jmx.description: Returns the current number of live daemon threads

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Threads/PeakThreadCount
monitor-jmx.description: Returns the peak live thread count since the Java virtual machine started or peak was reset

monitor-jmx.name: Description/JVM
monitor-jmx.description: Textual description for the Java Runtime running Tomcat server

monitor-jmx.name: Description/Specification/Host
monitor-jmx.description: Textual description about operating system and server hardware

monitor-value-pattern.pattern: Physical Memory Size: @TotalPhysicalMemorySize@ / Swap Space Size: @TotalSwapSpaceSize@
